Title: DarkLight
Description:
DarkLight is a 2D Lighting Engine written in XNA, and allows developers to create 2D shadowing effects in their 2D games easily.

It supports point, spot and area lights and is very easy to use.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
DarkLight is a 2D Lighting Engine written in XNA, and allows developers to create 2D shadowing effects in their 2D games easily.

It supports point, spot and area lights and is very easy to use.
